content: Automatic tripod PRA 90 kit ### Categories: Home > Products > Measuring tools & scanners > Accessories for measuring tools and scanners > Tripods- - - ### FEATURES:Features Fully automated horizontal alignment for one-person operation Time-saving – less manual setup needed Removes many opportunities for errors – less calculation and communication needed Built to last – friction clutch, and IP56 protection against dust and water Motorized tripod with 5/8 thread – height can be adjusted between 0.97 m and 1.95 m Applications Transferring heights (e.g. reference level marks) across construction sites Checking heights using a rotating laser Excavation Pouring concrete ### TECHNICAL DATA: For use with: PR 300-HV2S, PR 30-HVS, PR 30-HVSG Max. Height: 1900 mm Min. Height: 900 mm Technical Data | For use with | PR 300-HV2S, PR 30-HVS, PR 30-HVSG | Max. Height | 1900 mm | Min. Height | 900 mm ### ITEMS- 3508190 - Automatic tripod PRA 90 kit - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x PRA 90 Tripod - 1x PRA 84 HNA Battery pack assy - 1x PUA 81 (02) Mains adapter
